title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 3027/94 of 13 December 1994 amending Regulation (EC) No 1559/94 laying down detailed rules for the application in the poultrymeat and egg sectors of the arrangements provided for in the Interim Agreements between the Community, of the one part, and Bulgaria and Romania, of the other part
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 3027/94 of 13 December 1994 amending Regulation (EC) No 1559/94 laying down detailed rules for the application in the poultrymeat and egg sectors of the arrangements provided for in the Interim Agreements between the  Community, of the one part, and Bulgaria and Romania, of the other part
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1995.

(2), however, shall apply from 1 March 1995.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
